content.query:
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/sharedknow/users/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_users(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    CreationDate nvarchar(50),
    DownVotes nvarchar(10),
    LastAccessDate nvarchar(50)
)

WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/sharedknow/users/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(100) Id,CreationDate FROM master_party.dim_users;


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_users_100(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    CreationDate nvarchar(50),
    DownVotes nvarchar(10),
    LastAccessDate nvarchar(50),
    Reputation nvarchar(50),
    UpVote nvarchar(50),
    Views nvarchar(50),
    Email nvarchar(50)
)

WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/sharedknow/users/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_users_100;



-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT party_id,hash_unique,process_date, email,creation_date,
reputation_count, upvotes_count, downvotes_count, views_count, record_source, 
flag_active,load_date,creation_user
FROM master_party.m_party

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_users_dim
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_users_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 

SELECT TOP(100) Id,CreationDate FROM master_party.dim_users;
SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_users_dim



WITH ShortCreationTable(shortdate) AS (
SELECT CONVERT(DATE, SUBSTRING(creation_date, 1,10)) AS shortdate
FROM master_transaction.t_interaction
), DistinctDateTable (distinctdate) AS (
SELECT DISTINCT shortdate as distinctdate
FROM ShortCreationTable
)

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY distinctdate ASC) AS period_id, 
distinctdate as period,
YEAR(distinctdate) as year,
MONTH(distinctdate) as month
FROM DistinctDateTable;

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/sharedknow/users/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_users(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    CreationDate nvarchar(50),
    DownVotes nvarchar(10),
    LastAccessDate nvarchar(50)
)

WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/sharedknow/users/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(100) Id,CreationDate FROM master_party.dim_users;


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_users_100(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    CreationDate nvarchar(50),
    DownVotes nvarchar(10),
    LastAccessDate nvarchar(50),
    Reputation nvarchar(50),
    UpVote nvarchar(50),
    Views nvarchar(50),
    Email nvarchar(50)
)

WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/sharedknow/users/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_users_100;



-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT party_id,hash_unique,process_date, email,creation_date,
reputation_count, upvotes_count, downvotes_count, views_count, record_source, 
flag_active,load_date,creation_user
FROM master_party.m_party

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_users_dim
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_users_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 

SELECT TOP(100) Id,CreationDate FROM master_party.dim_users;
SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_users_dim



WITH ShortCreationTable(shortdate) AS (
SELECT CONVERT(DATE, SUBSTRING(creation_date, 1,10)) AS shortdate
FROM master_transaction.t_interaction
), DistinctDateTable (distinctdate) AS (
SELECT DISTINCT shortdate as distinctdate
FROM ShortCreationTable
)

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY distinctdate ASC) AS period_id, 
distinctdate as period,
YEAR(distinctdate) as year,
MONTH(distinctdate) as month
FROM DistinctDateTable;

/*---------------------------------------------
Script Inicial de UP Lakehouse
-----------------------------------------------
Autor: Mauro A. León Payano
Fecha: 12/12/2022*/
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 1: Creacion de repositorio de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE DATABASE updatalakehouse;
GO

USE updatalakehouse;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 2: Creacion de dataset por zona de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA master_transaction AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_party AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_channel AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business_knowa AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 3: Asignación de clave de encriptación y formato de tablas externas
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39248J#asdasdiu89yuj1k23sdpipi'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-30T09:39:32Z&st=2023-04-26T01:39:32Z&spr=https&sig=V2B7Vby5CiaJ6Fh%2FFiJAACclkboPC8PVHIHCAGIzy5g%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdsjlcgdev9by.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPDeltaFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
);
GO

/*---------------------------------------------
Script Inicial de UP Lakehouse
-----------------------------------------------
Autor: Jose Luis Cacho Guerrero
Fecha: 1/05/23*/
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 1: Creacion de repositorio de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE DATABASE updatatrabajofinal; --creamos la base de datos 
GO

USE updatatrabajofinal; --seleccionamos la base de datos a trabajar 
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 2: Creacion de dataset por zona de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA master_transaction AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_party AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_channel AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business_knowa AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 3: Asignación de clave de encriptación y formato de tablas externas
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39248J#asdasdiu89yuj1k23sd_tf'
GO --llave que va a incriptar la información, se usa la llave para ejecutar 

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-30T09:57:40Z&st=2023-05-02T01:57:40Z&spr=https&sig=CyGVnV1z8YyhUECepaHETnjAp2tgStB7p4rn3%2FV6gzs%3D'
GO -- credencial para unirse con la cuenta de almacenamiento

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdsjlcgdev9by.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPDeltaFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
);
GO
